def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = set()
    for config in getsets(idxs, 2):
        for x,y in permutations(config):
            check_xy_large = is_large(x, ctx) and is_large(y, ctx)
            check_xy_dark = is_dark(x, ctx) and is_dark(y, ctx)
            check_x_near_six = is_below(x, None, ctx) and is_middle(x, None, ctx)
            check_y_near_three = is_right(y, None, ctx) and is_middle(y, None, ctx)
            if (
                check_xy_large
                and check_xy_dark
                and check_x_near_six
                and check_y_near_three
            ):
                results.add(frozenset([x,y]))
    return results
state = turn(state)
